column4: this is starting to annoy me, Im trying to run a script (auto install) and it cannot install because for -some- reason it wont create the dirs by automatic
tar: /usr/local/cpanel/base/frontend/x: Cannot chdir: No such file or directory
Why doesnt it create it by itself ?
doesnt matter, doesnt work with sudo eaither
mkdir: cannot create directory `/var/cpanel/gameserv_saved/': No such file or directory
try running mkdir with the -p option
so im supposed to make all the folders that's didnt get created?
parent folders are only created with the -p option

what im saying is: I ran a script, and it's cPanel, and it's supposed to make its own dirs and add the files in the dirs it created, and not that im supposed to make the dirs manually and THEN run the install script.
I would ask the script creators about how the script works
Hmmmmm, don't know what the problem could be, then
